metadata.title: CVE-2021-20181 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A race condition flaw was found in the 9pfs server implementation of QEMUup to and including 5.2.0. This flaw allows a malicious 9p client to causea use-after-free error, potentially escalating their privileges on thesystem. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to confidentiality,integrity as well as system availability.

criterions.comment: qemu: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
